original_text: And the angel of the Lord said to Manoah, “If you detain me, I will not eat of your food. But if you prepare a burnt offering, then offer it to the Lord.” (For Manoah did not know that he was the angel of the Lord.)
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 마노아에게 이르되 네가 비록 나를 머물게 하나 내가 네 음식을 먹지 아니하리라 번제를 준비하려거든 마땅히 여호와께 드릴지니라 하니 이는 그가 여호와의 사자인 줄을 마노아가 알지 못함이었더라

sentences.original_text: And the angel of the Lord said to Manoah,
I will not eat of your food.
But if you prepare a burnt offering,
then offer it to the Lord.”
that he was the angel of the Lord.)
